text:
California Southern University | Irvine, CA | ONSITE | DevOps

CalSouthern is an accredited, 100-percent online university offering degrees in technology, psychology, business, law and criminal justice at the associate, bachelor’s, master’s and doctoral levels.

We were voted as one of Orange County’s best places to work and as the new CTO, I'm hiring a DevOps engineer to scale our current learning management software to meet our unprecedented growth. We are running on a Microsoft-stack now but you will implement newer technologies for us including NoSQL, additional cloud computing and much more.

Technology is always evolving and we value learning, contact me directly at akota[at]calsouthern[dot]edu or apply at https://www.calsouthern.edu/about-us/career-opportunities/de...
